field.name: help
field.p: Click to create a new order.
Use this menu to browse your preceeding orders. To record new orders, you should better use the menu Your Session for the touchscreen interface.

field.name: help
field.p: Click to add a new product.
You must define a product for everything you sell through the point of sale interface.
Do not forget to set the price and the point of sale category in which it should appear. If a product has no point of sale category, you can not sell it through the point of sale interface.

field.name: help
field.p: Click to define a new category.
Categories are used to browse your products through the touchscreen interface.
If you put a photo on the category, the layout of the touchscreen interface will automatically. We suggest not to put a photo on categories for small (1024x768) screens.

field.name: help
field.p: Click to add a payment method.

Payment methods are defined by accounting journals having the field PoS Payment Method checked. In order to be useable from the touchscreen interface, you must set the payment method on the Point of Sale configuration.

div.p: You can define another list of available currencies on the Cash Registers tab of the payment method.
